short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: The SunnyCash assistant shows you current deals while shopping online and reminds you of the possibility to get cashback!
short.de: Der SunnyCash Assistent zeigt dir beim Online-Shopping aktuelle Deals und erinnert dich an die Möglichkeit, Cashback zu erhalten!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The best deals and coupons when shopping online with the SunnyCash assistant for cashback and coupons...
Intelligent shopping was never so easy

The SunnyCash assistant shows you the current cashback rate and finds the best coupons and sale deals for you while you browse through your favourite online shop. With one click you activate the cashback and get cash back for each of your purchases. 

Install the free SunnyCash Shopping Assistant now.

- When visiting an online shop, the assistant shows you the current cashback rate
- Finds coupons and deals that allow you to make additional savings on your purchases
- Mark your favorite shops and favorite deals and receive browser notifications of new or expiring deals
- The wizard can be minimized at any time
